<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Opportune Throw](/Feats.aspx?ID=1192) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Juggler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=36)

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12); [Juggler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1187)

**Trigger**
A creature within 10 feet of you uses a [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) action or a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it’s using.

**Requirements**
You are Juggling a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon.

</column>

---

You make a thrown ranged Strike with the required weapon against the triggering creature. If you critically succeed and the trigger was a manipulate action, you [disrupt](/Rules.aspx?ID=394) that action. This Strike doesn’t count against your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn’t apply to this Strike.
name: Opportune Throw
requirement: You are Juggling a  thrown  weapon.
